Package access

Class ReportDAO

java.lang.Object
access.ReportDAO
public class ReportDAO extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ReportDAO()
    Data access object for X-Reports - used to generate X-reports for sales per hour - queries sales data for the current business day - provides breakdown by hour and transaction types example usage on frontend: ReportDAO reportDAO = new ReportDAO(); For basic X-report with hourly sales Listinvalid input: '<'Mapinvalid input: '<'String, Object>> hourlyReport = reportDAO.generateXReport("HOURLY_SALES"); For X-report with transaction type breakdowns Listinvalid input: '<'Mapinvalid input: '<'String, Object>> detailedReport = reportDAO.generateXReport("DETAILED");

      public ReportDAO()
      Data access object for X-Reports - used to generate X-reports for sales per hour - queries sales data for the current business day - provides breakdown by hour and transaction types example usage on frontend: ReportDAO reportDAO = new ReportDAO(); For basic X-report with hourly sales Listinvalid input: '<'Mapinvalid input: '<'String, Object>> hourlyReport = reportDAO.generateXReport("HOURLY_SALES"); For X-report with transaction type breakdowns Listinvalid input: '<'Mapinvalid input: '<'String, Object>> detailedReport = reportDAO.generateXReport("DETAILED");

  • Method Details

    • generateXReport

      public List<Map<String,Object>> generateXReport(String reportType) throws SQLException
      Generate an X-Report based on type
      Parameters:
      reportType - String of the type to generate; either HOUR_SALES or DETAILED
      Returns:
      List of Map objects containing Strings and Objects containing hourly sales data
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error is encountered
